localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Wall Street Week...
1. Stocks: all-time highs
2. Home prices: all-time highs
3. Corporate bond yields: all-time lows
4. Mortgage rates: all-time lows
5. Jerome Powell @ FOMC Meeting: we need many more years of 0% rates and bond buying to juice the markets & increase inflation. https://t.co/6uZadEys2s
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
华尔街周。
1.股票：创历史新高
2.房价：创历史新高
3、公司债收益率：创历史新低
4.按揭利率：创历史新低
5.杰罗姆·鲍威尔(Jerome Powell)@联邦公开市场委员会(FOMC)会议：我们需要更多年的零利率和债券购买来刺激市场，并增加通胀。https://t.co/6uZadEys2s

華爾街周。
1.股票：創歷史新高
2.房價：創歷史新高
3、公司債收益率：創歷史新低
4.按揭利率：創歷史新低
5.傑羅姆·鮑威爾(Jerome Powell)@聯邦公開市場委員會(FOMC)會議：我們需要更多年的零利率和債券購買來刺激市場，並增加通脹。https://t.co/6uZadEys2s

previous.excerpt: The best way to help save local businesses is getting more people in the door. Delight is the simplest way to tell a friend about a business. - Find your favorite spot, send the link to a friend and we'll donate money to that business when they check it out.
previous.title: Delight - Support local businesses by referring friends

localize.description: 帮助拯救当地企业的最好方法是让更多的人进来。高兴是告诉朋友关于生意的最简单的方式。-找到你最喜欢的地方，将链接发送给朋友，当他们查看时，我们将向该企业捐款。
localize.tagline: 通过推荐朋友来支持当地企业

localize.description: 幫助拯救當地企業的最好方法是讓更多的人進來。高興是告訴朋友關於生意的最簡單的方式。-找到你最喜歡的地方，將鏈接發送給朋友，當他們查看時，我們將向該企業捐款。
localize.tagline: 通過推薦朋友來支持當地企業
